lines.content: * Generate Command base on the inputs from the console.
* Remove whitespaces from the front and back if any
* Let the first word be the command
* second word be commandAction, if any
* Check is the user input is an integer
* @return true if it is an integer else false
* Duke is a personal assistant chatbot.
* It helps a person to keep track of various things.
private static final String INTRODUCE_MESSAGE = "Hello! I'm Duke";
private static final String ASK_MESSAGE = "What can I do for you?";
private static final String EXIT_MESSAGE = "Bye. Hope to see you again soon!";

* Print both introduce and ask messages.
* @param message Message entered by the user to be echoed

* @param commandGenerator given by user in console

* Handles the input and output that comes from the console
* Logs text passed into the parameter.
* Constructor with scanner initialised with Scanner.
* read inputs from the console and
* remove any whitespaces from the front and back.
* return the text that has been input into the console.

* Task class that contains information and methods about a task
* @author Rexong [copied some from the cs2103 website]
* Constructor for task setting the description to value passed in as parameter
* @return X if task is done else whitespace
return (isDone ? "X" : " "); // mark done task with X
* Description is the string representation of task

private static final String UNMARKED_MESSAGE = "OK, I've marked this task as not done yet:";
